item.title: Cloudflare Pages Configuration Test
item.description:
Cloudflare Pages Configuration Test #

This post tests the newly configured Cloudflare Pages deployment pipeline.

Configuration Updates Applied:

  • ✅ Build command: hugo --gc --minify
  • ✅ Build output: public
  • ✅ Production branch: main with auto-deploy enabled
  • ✅ Build system: Version 2 (Node.js 18.17.1)

Expected Result: If you can see this post on the live site, the Cloudflare Pages configuration is working correctly and all future commits will deploy automatically.
